body:
Dear Alejandro,
It has been my experience that when creating interior partitions and pillars in Ecotect the intersecting planes can make some of your outside walls disappear. Making your model incomplete the fact that you are getting 100% in a closed box leads me to believe you are having a modeling issue and not a daysim issue. Check your visualize screen and make sure all your planes  are present

Regards,

Tim Metcalfe
Kalwall Corporation
Daylight Modeling Group
1111 Candia Road
Manchester, N.H. 03105
1(800)258-9777 X4483
